error.errorServer: Something did not work, try again later
error.erroremail: It must be a valid email
error.errorpassword: Must have a length greater than 0

auth.erroremail: It must be a valid email
auth.errorpassword: Must have a length greater than 0
auth.errorname: Must have a length greater than 0
auth.duplicateKey: There is already a user with this email or nickname

newTravel.schedule: Choose the schedule of the trip
newTravel.startDayInfo: This is the day you arrive in the city and the time you start visiting places
newTravel.endDayInfo: This is the day you leave the city and the time you stop visiting places
newTravel.itineraryStartTimeInfo: This is the starting time to visit places on the rest of the days other than the arrival time
newTravel.itineraryEndTimeInfo: This is the final time to visit places the rest of the days other than leaving the city
newTravel.entryInfo: Select the places for which you have or plan to buy an entry
newTravel.visit: Choose the places not to visit
newTravel.visitInfo: Select the places you do NOT want to visit
newTravel.preferencesInfo: Select the categories of places that you are not interested in visiting

invite.head: Enter the email of the user to invite the trip
invite.duplicate: Cannot add a user that already exists in the trip
